location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: Brief letter enclosing corrected vouchers to replace those transmitted with the audit, and noting that Dr James Pringle Riach's receipts for his allowance as acting Resident would be sent once Dr Riach had returned to the Residency and was able to sign them.
